|en       = Trifaria Conscientia
|en_tl    = Threefold Knowledge

|en_note  = ''Conscienta'' can either mean "knowledge shared with others", "knowedge within oneself", or "one's knowledge of morality".
|zhs      = 三时三觉
|zhs_rm   = Sān shí sān jué
|zh_note  = {{zh|三時|rm=sān shí}} is a Buddhist term referring to "three periods", which can either mean the divisions of the day as dawn, daylight, and sunset, or the three periods of the Buddha's teachings: orthodox, scholastic, and decline. {{zh|三覺|rm=sān jué}} also refers to the three types of enlightment in Buddhism, either the trinity of self-enlightenment, enlightenment of others, and perfect enlightenment, or the three stages of potential enlightenment, subconscious intelligence, and perfect accord from the {{w|Awakening_of_Faith_in_the_Mahayana|Awakening of Faith}} doctrine.
|zht      = 三時三覺
